# actionUserInfoKey

**Type Property**

An action was taken. See `NSFontCollectionAction Key Values` for the possible values. An `NSString`.

## Declaration

```swift
class let actionUserInfoKey: NSFontCollection.UserInfoKey
```

## User Info Keys

- **nameUserInfoKey**: The font collection’s name. If renamed, this is the new name. An `NSString`.
- **oldNameUserInfoKey**: Included as a value for the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSFontCollection/oldNameUserInfoKey] key, if present. This is the previous name. An `NSString`.
- **visibilityUserInfoKey**: The visibly of the font collection. An NSNumber containing a value from the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSFontCollection/Visibility] enum.
